meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN - Park and Recreation Board Room and Videoconference, 1500 Marilla Street

agenda_items.title: Approval of the November 21, 2024, Arts and Culture Advisory Commission meeting minutes.
Vote to recommend new selection panelists to the Office of Arts and Culture’s Public Art Review Panel Roster.
Recommendation in support of the initiation of the City-Wide, Sidewalk Poetry Public Art Project.
agenda_items.description: To begin in the Esperanza District located in Council District 11.

agenda_items.title: Recommendation in support of the Arts and Culture Advisory Commission’s FY 2023-24 Annual Report.
Recommendation in support of the FY 2025-26 Cultural Organizations Program (COP) Guidelines.
Vote to recommend additional panelists to the Office of Arts and Culture’s Funding Programs Review Panel Roster.
